product_name: Mountain Hardwear Hibachi 45 Sleeping Bag - Long - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Explore the outdoors on mild spring, summer and fall nights with the long-length Mountain Hardwear Hibachi 45 Sleeping Bag with water-repellent 600-fill down. With a European Norm (EN) lower-limit rating of 40degF the Hibachi 45 is ideal for lightweight 3-season adventures on warm nights in the mountains. Insulated with lightweight and compressible Q.Shield 600-fill-power goose down to keep you warm. Q.Shield DOWN advance water repellency technology protects individual down fibers from moisture so they retain loft and insulation properties; Q.Shield won't wear off. Comfort mummy cut gives you room to move around while maintaining great warmth. 30-denier ripstop nylon shell is lightweight and tear-resistant; fabric is treated with a durable water repellent finish to repel moisture. Tight, 5-in. baffle spacing keeps down from shifting and prevents cold spots. Insulated draft tube extends to bottom of bag to eliminate cold spots. Multi-baffled, tailored hood lies close along the sides of neck and face for easy warmth. Ergonomic collar drapes comfortably over neck and shoulders, sealing out drafts; no need to cinch it unless the temperature outside is close to bag's limit. When it's cold enough to cinch down the hood, the down-insulated face gasket snugs comfortably and holds in warmth. Full-length, 2-way zipper has locking sliders that stay in place when bag is partially unzipped for ventilation. Comfort footbox is shaped to allow feet to rest naturally; shape preserves loft and allows insulation to drape close to feet for warmth. Mountain Hardwear Hibachi 45 Sleeping Bag comes with a mesh storage sack and stuff sack. European Norm (EN) is an independent third-party temperature rating, allowing accurate comparisons across brands with other EN-rated bags. Closeout.
